name: neon.racer
description:
This was a prototype originally made for 7dfps, although I could only spend 3 days on it at the time and didn't submit, and it was more of a tech demo trying to make post-processing fx that would evoke a sense of speed. I spent another 3 weeks making some track pieces and adding some quality of life features.

I've used a bunch of things like Unity's Adam plane reflection that afaik aren't really intended for production, but are very pretty. :P I've only tested it on my high-end Windows machine, and although I've uploaded a Mac build I have no idea how well it'll run, if at all, and whether it'll visually be what I intended.
